author: SciShow
description:
Go to http://complexlylearnathon.com to check out the Learnathon schedule and support our cool stuff!

Most science experiments take a few months or years, but some take a whole lot longer. Here are six of the longest-running experiments of all time, including one expected to last 500 years. 

Hosted by: Madelyn Leembruggen (she/her)

title: The 500-Year-Long Experiment
